neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Surveillance Sample VB.NET
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: This sample program demonstrates this Surveillance functionality:[br/] [b]Detects all the faces.[/b][br/] [b]Tracks all detected faces.[/b][br/] [b]Performs real-time identification of the tracked faces.[/b][br/] [b]Logs all surveillance events in the right panel.[/b][br/] [b]Allows to add faces which disappear from camera's field of view to watch list in real time.[/b][br/] [b]Allows to modify all NSurveillance parameters.[/b][br/] [b]Allows to review the faces in watch list.[/b][br/]
